dmca.title: DMCA notice
dmca.body: The notice was sent to Mitch Sprague the business manager of the ISP hosting company of my website www.donthirejeffereyleving.com threatening possible legal action under the DMCA if they don't take my site down.  The ISP complied however I want to try to get legal protection under the 1st Amendment for my site to exist so other ISP's will host it.
